00095 enum ACTION_ENVELOPE
00096 {
00097         ACTION_ENV_REWRITE_FROM_SENDER, 
00098         ACTION_ENV_NONE,                        
00099         ACTION_ENV_PARA,                        
00100         ACTION_ENV_SIN,                         
00101         ACTION_ENV_PARA_TIME,           
00102         ACTION_ENV_SIN_TIME,            
00103         ACTION_ENV_PHYSICAL,            
00104 };
00105 
00106 struct ACTION_ENVELOPE_DATA
00107 {
00108         enum ACTION_ENVELOPE type;
00109         [switch_type(enum ACTION_ENVELOPE), switch_is(type)] 
00110         union
00111         {
00112                 [case(ACTION_ENV_PARA, ACTION_ENV_SIN)]                         struct { FWFLOAT fEaseIn; FWFLOAT fEaseOut; };
00113                 [case(ACTION_ENV_PARA_TIME, ACTION_ENV_SIN_TIME)]       struct { FWULONG timeEaseIn; FWULONG timeEaseOut; };
00114                 [case(ACTION_ENV_PHYSICAL)]                                                     struct { FWFLOAT fS, fV, fA, fJ; };
00115                 [default]                                                                                       struct { FWFLOAT f1, f2, f3, f4;};
00116         };
00117 };
